title: XBRL UTR duration Item Type units (2024-10-22)
description: Valid units for durationItemType as defined in the XBRL Units Type Registry

anyOf.title: Year
anyOf.description: Gregorian calendar year of 365 days. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Month
anyOf.description: Gregorian calendar month of 30.41 days. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Day
anyOf.description: Day of 24 hours. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Hour
anyOf.description: Hour of 60 minutes. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Minute
anyOf.description: Minute of 60 seconds. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Second
anyOf.description: Second. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Quarter
anyOf.description: Gregorian Calendar Quarter (three months). Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units

anyOf.title: Week
anyOf.description: Gregorian Calendar Week. Use only as a denominator because durationItemType is not numeric and has no units
